An example of a quick sort implementation in Fortran for a real array:

recursive subroutine quicksort(a, first, last)
  implicit none
  real*8, intent(inout) :: a(*)
  integer, intent(in) :: first, last
  real*8 :: pivot, temp
  integer i, j

  if (first >= last) return

  pivot = a((first + last)/2)
  i = first
  j = last

  do while (i <= j)
    do while (a(i) < pivot) i = i + 1
    end do
    do while (a(j) > pivot)
      j = j - 1
    end do
    if (i <= j) then
      temp = a(i)
      a(i) = a(j)
      a(j) = temp i = i + 1
      j = j - 1
    end if
  end do

  call quicksort(a, first, j)
